Text: This game was requested here and there for some users at my blog then i decided to take a look and see the possible work on the game and the game is really fun with many missions in a GTA syle environment then i tought that the lot of fans of the GTA games out there didn?t mind probably to take a look on this one and the game was worked too by the Rockstar Games like for GTAs , s i think if you are a gamer that like GTA games , you will not be disappointed taking a look on the gameplay of this one . Play and enjoy this funny Rockstar game ...

The final size that i get is really positive , with everything nice and intact i get less 1.3 gb than the original pc-dvd iso , it is in directplay style , the user only needs to run a executable to be playing the game .
Watch videos about the game including a little bit of the gameplay in the next link :
http://www.livestream.com/globeliveshow

The globeliveshow is not me making streaptease or something , the included videos are recorded live and then the available videos stay in the channel player to be watched anytime by the users , i decided to create this extra link in the way that watching a little bit of the gameplay of the games or useful videos can be interesting and praical from the point of view of the user while downloading the file for example , so if i find something that in someway can be useful to the users i make the work , not really beeing worried about number of viewers but the games videos recorded are in there to the possible viewers watch anytime they want . Thank you .

Hey Globe, just want to say fantastic rips, I have been Following your work for a while now, every single one I have has worked, needing only a little playing around to get it working (huge fan of your just cause 2 rip).

I wanted to know if you can get a 1.20 patch out and working for this rip, it fixes so many problems.

IF YOU ARE MISSING TEXTURES, there is a kinda crappy fix (but worth it for this game) you have to limit you memory
 (windows key + R) then type msconfig in the window, you need to limit to 2000 or less, works for me.

Hey Globe, just want to say fantastic rips, I have been Following your work for a while now, every single one I have has worked, needing only a little playing around to get it working (huge fan of your just cause 2 rip).

I wanted to know if you can get a 1.20 patch out and working for this rip, it fixes so many problems.

IF YOU ARE MISSING TEXTURES, there is a kinda crappy fix (but worth it for this game) you have to limit you memory
 (windows key + R) then type msconfig in the window choose boot tab then advanced and tick max memory, you need to limit to 2000 or less, works for me.

I first off wanted to say thanks, and second off it took me alil bit to get this game working. I got the missing xinput_3.dll error like some people are saying but i fixed it by downloading the directx sdk installer and doing it that way. it really really works. Ive been playing it on my laptop with 2.0 dual core processor, 4gb ram, and 128mb video card, and windows 64bit, with no problems after doing the directx sdk install,. i havent installed a patch or nething just played what came with this torrent and it works great no loading problems at all, past mission 6 now.

Thanx again globe, keep up the amazing work
